description:
George Soros' duty in his service to the global cult is to divide and destroy America. If you think this white Zionist billionaire gives a damn about a single black person in the United States you've been fooled. This man wants nothing more than to see America fall apart and collapse entirely, that is why he has been the most prominent figure in the modern manufactured race war. Divide and conquer... Blacks vs Whites, Cops vs Citizens, Democrats vs Republicans, etc etc etc. The Elites NEED us to be divided in order to have any sort of protection. Have you seen the videos of riot saboteurs/provocateurs instigating chaos and violence? Or the bricks being setup outside of glass buildings to get people to create more and more chaos. They've done this to create the perfect excuse to impose Martial Law. Trump has already said he will call in the military to American cities if needed. This entire thing has been set up. Every single part of it, including the murder. It's easier than you think to manipulate people or to hire people into assassinating a person when you have billions of dollars available.  Manufactured divide and chaos. Also... did you notice how the ""pandemic"" seems to have vanished? Too many people were seeing through the bullshit, so they needed a new headline to distract us while they create billions of vaccines behind the scene. Then guess what will come next... ""THE SECOND WAVE Ko-Ved-nine t33n!!!! 😱😱😱"" Aka the next phase of the scamdemic. Don't forget the real war going on, The Elites vs Humanity.

#scamdemic #plandemic #covidlockdown #divideandconquer #dividedwefall #unitedwestand #fighttogether #humanrights #humanityhealing #humanconnection #humanrightsviolations #policestate #1984georgeorwell #protectfreedom
